posts.post_title: Two difficult 1909 Obaks for sale - Ragan and Ort
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen

Got a couple tough 1909 Obaks available.  Both are very sharp with very little wear, no wrinkling and no back damage.  Both of these are tougher players to find in the set as well.  Asking $225 apiece....

[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1239756394.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1239756415.JPG[/IMG] 

Thanks in advance,
